home.title: Master the Road with
home.description: Professional driving lessons tailored to your pace. From first-time drivers to advanced skills - we'll get you road-ready safely and efficiently.

about.title: Why Choose Champion Driving School?
about.description: With over a decade of experience, we've helped thousands of students become confident, safe drivers. Our comprehensive approach combines modern teaching methods with personalized attention.
about.safety_first_description: Modern vehicles with advanced safety features and comprehensive insurance coverage for peace of mind.
about.expert_instructors_description: Certified professionals with years of experience and a passion for teaching safe driving habits.
about.flexible_schedule_description: Book lessons at your convenience with our easy online scheduling system and flexible timing.

branch.location_descriptions: Conveniently located to serve you better

course.title: Other Services We Offer
course.descriptions: Beyond driving lessons, we provide comprehensive vehicle and licensing services to meet all your transportation needs.
course.courses_descriptions: Choose the perfect course for your needs
course.description_vehicle_ownership_change: Complete transfer documentation and legal assistance
course.description_police_challan_assistance: Traffic violation resolution and payment support
course.description_vehicle_insurance_services: Comprehensive insurance plans and claim assistance

instructors.title: Meet Our Expert Instructors
instructors.description: Learn from certified professionals with years of experience and thousands of successful students.

gallery.title: Our Gallery
gallery.descriptions: Take a look at our modern facilities, professional vehicles, and students in action
